alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 16 at 5:26AM EDT until July 17 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...High water levels may produce some minor flooding due to high astronomical tides. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. In Maine, Coastal Cumberland and Coastal York Counties. * WHEN...After midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/02 AM 10.6 1.1 0.2 1 None 16/02 PM 9.3 -0.2 0.2 1 None 17/02 AM 10.4 0.9 0.2 1 None 17/03 PM 9.4 -0.1 0.3 1-2 None 18/03 AM 10.0 0.5 0.3 2 None 18/04 PM 9.4 -0.1 0.4 2 None Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/02 AM 10.4 1.6 0.2 2 None 16/02 PM 9.1 0.3 0.2 2 None 17/02 AM 10.2 1.4 0.2 2 None 17/03 PM 9.2 0.4 0.3 2 None 18/03 AM 9.8 1.0 0.3 2 None 18/04 PM 9.2 0.4 0.4 2 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/02 PM 10.4 0.7 0.4 2 None 17/02 AM 11.5 1.8 0.3 2 None 17/03 PM 10.4 0.7 0.4 2 None 18/03 AM 11.1 1.4 0.4 2 None 18/04 PM 10.3 0.6 0.4 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
